translation.onboardDesc1: Cash-in and out of crypto in an anonymous, P2P marketplace.
translation.onboardDesc2: Send payments to friends and family instantly.
translation.onboardDesc3: Access Web3 and the world of Decentralized Finance
translation.userThisIsHow: This is how other wallet users can find you and send you payments. Always use an alias for maximum security.
translation.searchableUsername: Searchable by other users. Username is also displayed in the market section.
translation.notSearchableUsername: Not searchable by users. Username will be displayed as “Anonymous” in the market section.
translation.usernameError: Username must be at least 4 characters
translation.recoverForgotPin: To recover forgotten PINs Or passwords
translation.pTip1: Use an email unique to Surf Wallet.
translation.pTip2: Don’t use your real name or other personal info.
translation.pTip3: Use an end-to-end encrypted email service (PGP)
translation.strongPassword: A strong password is highly recommended.
translation.makeSureNetwork: Make sure you are connected to the internet.
translation.thisIsYourPrivateKey: This is your private key. If you lose this key, you lose access to your wallet and everything in it.
translation.writeDownSeedPhrase: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and store it somewhere safe.
translation.surfWalletStaff1: Surf Wallet will never ask you to share your private key or
translation.surfWalletStaff2: They belong to the wallet owner only.
translation.seedIsPrivateKey2: is your Private Key, but in human language.
translation.seedIsPrivateKey3: If you ever break or lose your device, you can simply import your wallet to a new device using the Seed phrase or Private key.
translation.ifLoseSeedPrase: If you lose your seed phrase, you lose access to your wallet. It can never be recovered.
translation.agreedTS: I agree to the Terms of Service
translation.understandLosingAccess: I understand that losing access to the Seed phrase means losing access to my wallet and all the funds inside it.
translation.howYouAppear: This is how you appear to other users.
translation.resetInfo1: You are about to reset your password. Instructions will be sent to
translation.checkEmail: Check your email and follow the instructions listed there.
translation.sendOffertoSeller: Send an offer to the seller.
translation.yourOfferWillListed: Your offer will be listed on the Buy Bitcoin page.
translation.mpDetails: Your offer’s selling price will change according to the market price of Bitcoin.
translation.fpDetails: Your offer’s selling price is locked when you create it, and won’t change with the market price.
translation.offerPriceInfo: Offer price: 5100 USD per Bitcoin (100% of the market price for every Bitcoin you buy.
translation.listOutYour: List out your instructions for your trade partner.
translation.anybodyWhoView: Anybody who views your offer will see these terms. Keep them simple and clear to make your offer sound attractive.
translation.toEnsureSuccessfull: To ensure a succesful trade be transparent about what you expect from your trade partner and list out what you need.
translation.doNotRelease: Do not release the funds from escrow before receiving your payment in hand.
translation.checkFlatNotes: Check the fiat notes before you release funds from escrow.
translation.alwaysMeet: Always meet in a public place.
translation.willBeSentTrade: will be sent to the buyer’s wallet.
translation.mettUpInPersonTrade: Meet up in person. USD or LBP (at current market price) accepted. Available MON-FRI from 6:00AM till 3:00PM. DM me on insta: @0x__Ahyani09
translation.hasBeenReserved: has been reserved for this trade
translation.fundsWillBeSentBack: Funds will be sent back to your wallet and the trade will be cancelled
translation.xmrInfo: Monero payments are completely anonymous and untraceable.
translation.sendYourFund: Send your funds to escrow and arrange a meeting with the buyer.
translation.waitingForSellerDetails: Waiting for the seller to transfer funds to escrow.
translation.meetBuyerDetails: Never release funds before getting your cash in hand. Count and check the fiat notes carefully. If everything looks good, release the funds from escrow to the buyer’s wallet.
translation.sellerFundedFund: The seller transferred the funds to escrow.
translation.meetSellerDetails: Meet the seller and pay them in cash. Always meet in a public place.
translation.waitForSellertoRelease: Wait for the seller to release BTC from the escrow system.
translation.walletAddressPH: Enter a wallet Adress or Domain
translation.areYouSureDeleteContact1: Are you sure your want to remove
